name: WANDERLOST
description:
Venture into the woods. 

Find a way out — or stay forever.

The past is a fragment of the present. The present is a fragment of the past.  And some things are better left in pieces.

WANDERLOST is a narrative-driven horror puzzle game inspired by classic RPG Maker titles such as The Witch's House, Ib, and Mad Father.

This project was made in a single semester and features an original soundtrack.
